snippet: Your bathroom tile is in good shape, but it’s an unappealing color. Should you rip it out before selling?
abstract: Market Ready Q&A gives advice on how to decorate around bright bathroom tile, so potential home buyers are not deterred by color.
lead_paragraph: Your bathroom tile is in good shape, but it’s an unappealing color. Should you rip it out before selling?

headline.seo: Bathroom Tile’s Color: Sales Killer? — Market Ready
